mapper.select:
select o.pk_id pkId, o.order_no orderNo, o.total_fee totalFee, o.pay_fee payFee, o.order_status orderStatus, o.create_time createTime, o.update_time updateTime, o.remark, mc.name merchantName, d.code deviceCode, p.name productName, pr.pay_time payTime, pr.transaction_no transactionNo, m.nickname nickname, m.open_id openId
FROM tbl_order o LEFT JOIN tbl_merchant mc ON o.fk_merchant_id = mc.pk_id LEFT JOIN tbl_device d ON o.fk_device_id = d.pk_id LEFT JOIN tbl_product p ON o.fk_product_id = p.pk_id LEFT JOIN tbl_pay_record pr ON pr.fk_order_id = o.pk_id LEFT JOIN tbl_member m ON m.pk_id = o.fk_member_id
where o.order_status != 0
AND o.order_no like "%"#{obj.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND mc.name like "%"#{obj.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND o.order_status = #{obj.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND pr.transaction_no like "%"#{obj.transactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
order by o.create_time desc
